alert.note: Alert for Southeast Fayette; Southeast Nicholas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:20AM EST until January 29 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Southeast Fayette and Southeast Nicholas Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 7 AM this morning to 1 AM EST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 4 AM to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
